meanings.definition: A condition characterized by purple or red discolorations on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with purpuras after noticing the unusual skin discolorations.
meanings.sent2: She had purpuras on her arms and legs, causing concern among her family.
meanings.sent3: The purpuras on his face made him look like a walking rainbow!
meanings.sent4: Her purpuras were like little patches of paint splattered on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The purpuras stood out vividly against her pale complexion.

meanings.definition: A plural form of purpura, referring to multiple instances of the condition.
meanings.sent1: The hospital had several cases of purpuras this week, keeping the medical staff busy.
meanings.sent2: The outbreak of purpuras in the community raised awareness about skin health.
meanings.sent3: The purpuras in the clinic seemed to be having a party of their own!
meanings.sent4: The purpuras spread across the town like a colorful wave.
meanings.sent5: The purpuras dotted the landscape, creating a striking sight.
